General.Name: Hemostemix Inc
General.Description: Hemostemix Inc., a clinical stage biotechnology company, develops, manufactures, and commercializes blood-derived stem cell therapies for medical conditions. The company develops cell therapy products from the patient's own blood, which is a non-invasive source of therapeutic cells. Its lead product is ACP-01, an autologous cell therapy, which is in Phase II clinical trial for the treatment of vascular diseases, such as cardiovascular disease, peripheral arterial disease, angina pectoris, and ischemia in Canada and the United States. The company is also developing various types of cell products, such as synergetic cell populations, neural cell precursors, and cardiomyocyte cell precursors. Hemostemix Inc. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 707-7th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3H6
